findings.title: Owner can change tax and liquidity fees
findings.description: The owner has privileges to modify tax and liquidity fees which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change maximum transaction amount
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the maximum transaction amount.

findings.title: Owner can exclude from the fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to exclude certain addresses or users from paying fees.

findings.title: Owner can change marketingDivisor
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the marketing divisor.

findings.title: Owner can change minimum number of tokens to add to liquidity
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the minimum number of tokens required to add liquidity.

findings.title: Owner can change buyBackUpperLimit
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the buyBackUpperLimit, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: WhaleTamer can enable and disable buyBack
findings.description: The WhaleTamer has the privilege to enable or disable the buyBack feature.

findings.title: WhaleTamer can change whaleTamer address
findings.description: The WhaleTamer has the privilege to modify its own address.

findings.title: Owner can change buyback percentage
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the buyback percentage, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change Uniswap router
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the Uniswap router.

findings.title: Owner can enable and disable buyBack
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to enable or disable the buyBack feature.

findings.title: Owner can lock and unlock
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to lock and unlock, which could allow them to retake privileges even after ownership was renounced.

findings.title: Owner can retake privileges even after the ownership was renounced
findings.description: The owner can lock and unlock, allowing them to retake privileges even after the ownership was renounced.

findings.title: Owner can enable before and after presale modes
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to enable or disable presale modes, which could lead to potential security risks.
